Html:
A number of the samples cycle endlessly while loading.  The problem is with the ChartPlotter setup XAML.  One such case is the XAML for the seperate EditableShapes example under the "0.4" solution folder (note: this example has correct XAML under the "DynamicDataDisplay.Samples" solution folder).

The XAML is:

<d3:ChartPlotter Name="plotter">

But should be something like:

<d3"ChartPlotter Name="plotter" visible="0,0,1,1">

As is the case in another version of the same example.

It seems that when the "visible" attribute is not present, the chart setup goes into an endless loop during its viewport setup phase.  Is this a bug in the XAML or the chart setup code?

I noticed that too.  I posted about it in: http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=81241

But I have had no response. 

E.
